name: Real Poltergeist
overview: Gavin Raeburn made Poltergeist for Codemasters while working at AGC Systems Ltd, but this is the game he wanted to make. You are in control of a exorcist space craft and you must destroy a Poltergeist. Before this though you have to fly over 32 levels and destroy his minions and generators (flashing boxes). After each generator is destroyed you need to land on a teleport pad to get to the next level. There are plenty of weapon upgrades to collect to complete your mission by collecting Power Transmuters.
